summary: A prison guard goes undercover as a dancer to try and recapture an escaped criminal and restore her police inspector boyfriend's reputation.
cast: Sanjay Dutt|Madhuri Dixit|Jackie Shroff|Rakhee Gulzar|Anupam Kher|Ramya Krishnan|Pramod Moutho|Sushmita Mukherjee|A.K. title: Khal Nayak
